column1: Little Goat Diner////I had the breakfast spaghetti with crab and clams that sort of reminded me of egg foo yong with broth until that luscious egg yolk popped once I got to the center of the dish. Yum! The side of pea tendrils was also the perfect balance of fresh
column4: crunchy. When I first brought the pea tendrils to my mouth
column5: I could smell the dirt smell of fresh vegetables
column8: I thought the tendrils were well cooked
column9: still crunchy but infused with the cooking flavors.
